description:
After just one night at the academy, Lion finds tests waiting for her in the morning. Lion is disheartened after some very disappointing grades. She cheers up after talking with Yuko and all her friends in the student council while eating Yuko`s home made cookies. And so she goes to face her first covenant. How will Rosa react to Lion`s feelings towards her?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gattai wa Ichinichi ni Shite Narazu / Hana yori Onigiri
L`union doit être faite / Du riz plutôt que des fleurs
Transforming Is Not Mastered in a Day / Rice Balls over Flowers
合体は一日にしてならず / 花よりおにぎり
합체는 하루아침에 이루어지지 않는다 / 금강산도 주먹밥 먹고나서
